NC.Q: Which is larger, the value of Workplace Wellbeing or Employee Lifecycle?
NC.A: The value of {Workplace Wellbeing} is larger.

NC.Q: Which is larger, the value of Workplace Wellbeing, Employee Lifecycle, or Recruitment?
NC.A: The value of {Workplace Wellbeing} is larger.

NC.Q: Which has the largest value: Workplace Wellbeing, Employee Lifecycle, Recruitment, or Employee Assistance?

NC.A: The value of {Work-Life Balance} is smaller.

MSR.Q: Which hierarchical path in the sunburst chart makes the largest contribution to the total?
MSR.A: The path that contributes the most to the total is: {Workplace Wellbeing to Work-Life Balance to Employee Assistance to Financial Wellness}.
